amendment.description: To make a technical correction to the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2735 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2735 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S8010-8011; text: CR S8010-8011) To make a technical correction to the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2735 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Menendez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2735 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
